N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.23 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations

Sabbatical leaves may be granted for periods of one year
at rates not to exceed one-half basic annual salary, or for periods of one-half
year at rates not to exceed full basic annual salary. Eligible employees on
sabbatical leave may, with the prior approval of the chief administrative
officer, accept fellowships, grant-in-aid, or earned income to assist in
accomplishing the purposes of their leaves. In such cases, the chief
administrative officer may adjust the sabbatical leave salaries to reflect such
income, either prior to or during the periods of such leaves; provided, however, that in no case shall sabbatical leave salary be reduced if total
earnings are less than full salary. Notes
